feature.label: jFamilyCounselor
feature.description: jFamilyCounselor proposes a metric-based static code analysis, capable of identifying fragments containing hidden familial type correlations in Java source code. What are hidden familial type correlations and how jFamilyCounselor detects them are widely presented in: Alin-Petru Roșu, Petru-Florin Mihancea, Towards the Detection of Hidden Familial Type Correlations in Java Code, LOOSE Research Group, 2022.
